definition: to remain unmoved
(negative prefix)/not/no
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Even in the most extreme case imaginable, John Paul II's church was immoveable.
sentences.chinese: 即使是最极端的情况，保罗二世的教会也不为所动。

sentences.english: When I relate such findings to Vicino, he is unmoved.
sentences.chinese: 当我跟维奇诺提及这些时，他却不为所动。

sentences.english: The old emperor asks Calàf to reconsider but he will not be dissuaded.
sentences.chinese: 老皇帝要求卡拉富重新考虑，但卡拉富不为所动。

sentences.english: Fujimura man calm, no matter what things are unmoved.
sentences.chinese: 藤村为人沉着冷静，无论遇到什么事都不为所动”。

sentences.english: ChenYan son smell speech goes ahead and keep claims must revenge for the duke.
sentences.chinese: 陈燕儿闻言不为所动，口口声称一定要为陈国复仇。

sentences.english: The fatterthey get, and the more leptin they make, the more impervious thehypothalamus becomes.
sentences.chinese: 他们越胖，产生的瘦素越多，下丘脑也就越不为所动。

sentences.english: Similarly, on hearing a fire alarm many people do absolutely nothing.
sentences.chinese: 同样的，一听到火灾警报，许多人是完全不为所动的。

sentences.english: But the beam of the lamp falls straight from the window.
sentences.chinese: 但窗子里灯光却丝毫不为所动，依然直直地照射出来。

definition: aloof/indifferent/unconcerned
to turn a deaf ear to (idiom); to pretend not to hear
to block one's ears and not listen (idiom); to turn a deaf ear
not to overlook, nor spare (idiom); unwilling to forgive/to treat severely without listening to excuses
to turn a blind eye to
not to mind/unconcerned
to disdain as beneath contempt (idiom)
unwilling to give up/unresigned
to not say a word (idiom)
to not move a single jot (idiom)
to not say a word
not in the least concerned (idiom)/reckless/couldn't give a damn about it/unperturbed/couldn't care less/harum scarum
to keep silent
to completely ignore (idiom)/to pay no attention to/not to be in the least concerned about
indifferent/apathetic/cold
the cool eye of a bystander/a detached point of view
